Subject: Customer not able to access Customer Portal
Description: Christian has signed up to the customer Portal but does not receive the confirmation email allowing him to complete the sign up. He has checked SPAM and nothing appears. Email is : lehr@lehr.at
What_We_Know__c:
Customer is not receiving the confirmation email when trying to access the customer portal.
Checked and the account is activated
Next_Steps__c: Waiting for customer to check if he can access to the portal now, or if he need to reset the password.
